item.title: CME 和 S&P 探讨出售交易后合资企业 OSTTRA
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group Inc.【原文：CME Group Inc. and S&P Global Inc. are weighing a sale of a joint venture offering post-trade services in the foreign exchange and derivatives markets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 银行如何从资产负债表中卸载风险
item.description:
深入了解合成风险转移。【原文：

A deep dive into synthetic risk transfers.

】

item.title: 生机勃勃的绿色田野预示着美国玉米产量大、价格弱
item.description: 今年夏天，冰雹、强风、洪水和植物病害让美国玉米作物经历了一段艰难的时期。但不知何故，这片覆盖美国心脏地带的绿色田野被证明具有顽强的生命力。【原文：Between hail, strong winds, floods and plant disease, US corn crops were put through some tough times this summer. But somehow, the fields of green blanketing America’s heartland have proved to be ever resilient.】

item.title: Fridson 认为低期限限制了信贷反弹中的垃圾债券
item.description: 当信贷市场因预期利率下降而反弹时，一位垃圾债券大师却警告说，高风险债务可能会让人失望。【原文：While credit markets rally in anticipation of lower interest rates, a junk bond guru is warning that risky debt may underwhelm.】

item.title: 埃利奥特从德意志银行和解协议中获得 2 亿欧元报酬
item.description: 知情人士透露，随着德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）着手解决一场旷日持久的法律纠纷，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）将从德意志银行获得近 2 亿欧元（约合 2.22 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Elliott Investment Management is receiving nearly €200 million ($222 million) from Deutsche Bank AG as the German lender moves to resolve a long-running legal dispute, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 鸽子吓跑了杰克逊霍尔的熊
item.description:
美联储会议纪要为削减半分打开了大门：英格兰人

Fed minutes open door to half-point cut: Englander

】

item.title: 私人信贷经理帮助银行留住高风险客户
item.description: 在私人信贷市场上，经理们越来越多地与银行合作，帮助他们与高风险的石油、天然气和煤炭客户维持利润丰厚的合同。【原文：In the market for private credit, managers are increasingly partnering with banks to help them maintain lucrative contracts with risky oil, gas and coal clients.】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安称市场对美联储降息的定价过高
item.description: 穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）认为，交易员们高估了美联储在今年年底前进行一系列积极降息的前景。【原文：Traders are overplaying the prospects of an aggressive series of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts before the end of the year, according to Mohamed El-Erian.】

item.title: 阿达尼创始人拟通过出售水泥股筹资 5 亿美元
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼及其家族拥有的一家公司计划出售 5 亿美元的 Ambuja 水泥有限公司股份。【原文：A firm owned by billionaire Gautam Adani and his family plan to sell $500 million of Ambuja Cements Ltd.’s shares.】

item.title: 英国国家环境基金（BNEF）称，美国页岩油将因效率提高而加速生产
item.description: 据 BloombergNEF 报道，由于油井生产率提高，2025 年美国石油日产量将增加 60 万桶，比今年增长约 50%。【原文：US oil production will grow by 600,000 barrels a day in 2025, about 50% more than this year, due to higher well productivity, according to BloombergNEF.】

item.title: NFT Marketplace Magic Eden 将业务拓展到 NFT 之外
item.description: 魔法伊甸园（Magic Eden）是最大的非可流通代币市场之一，由于对数字收藏品的需求仍低于两年前的峰值水平，该市场正在向交易等类别多元化发展。【原文：Magic Eden, one of the largest marketplaces for nonfungible tokens, is diversifying into categories such as trading, as demand for the digital collectibles remains below the peak levels of two years ago.】

item.title: 美国制造业活动以今年最快速度萎缩
item.description: 由于生产、订单和工厂就业进一步疲软，美国制造业活动在本月初以今年最快的速度萎缩。【原文：US manufacturing activity shrank early this month at the fastest pace this year on further weakness in production, orders and factory employment.】

item.title: 台湾新光金融同意与竞争对手台新合并
item.description: 台湾新光金融控股股份有限公司（Shin Kong Financial Holding Co.【原文：Taiwan’s Shin Kong Financial Holding Co. agreed to merge with a smaller rival in a deal that sets up a takeover battle for Shin Kong with another suitor, CTBC Financial Holding Co.】

item.title: 孟加拉国将从下周起提高政策利率以应对物价上涨
item.description: 孟加拉国中央银行新任命的行长阿赫桑-曼苏尔（Ahsan H. Mansur）表示，该行计划在下周将政策利率上调半个百分点，以应对已飙升至十多年来最高水平的通货膨胀。【原文：Bangladesh’s central bank plans to increase its policy interest rate by half a percentage point next week, aiming to fight inflation that has surged to its highest level in over a decade, according to the authority’s newly-appointed Governor Ahsan H. Mansur.】

item.title: 洛比托大西洋铁路公司首次从刚果民主共和国向美国出口铜矿
item.description: 由洛比托大西洋铁路公司（Lobito Atlantic Railway）运输的第一批来自刚果民主共和国铜矿的美国铜货物已经装船。【原文：The first US shipment of copper from mines in the Democratic Republic in Congo to be transported by the Lobito Atlantic Railway has loaded.】

item.title: 美国可转换债券发行量因市场波动和利率不确定而下滑
item.description: 美国股市 8 月份的狂风暴雨让可转换债券发行商无所适从，这种情况很可能会持续到 9 月份，因为利率的走势仍然悬而未决。【原文：The US stock market’s August whipsaw has convertible bond issuers hiding, and that’s likely to continue into September with the movement of interest rates still up in the air.】

item.title: 匈牙利称莫尔接近达成经乌克兰向俄罗斯供应石油的协议
item.description: 匈牙利称，炼油厂 Mol Nyrt. 正在讨论通过乌克兰从俄罗斯卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）接收原油的变通办法，可能在未来几个月内实施，但预计这将导致运输成本增加。【原文：Hungary said refiner Mol Nyrt. is discussing a workaround to receive crude from Russia’s Lukoil PJSC via Ukraine, possibly in the coming months, though that’s expected to result in increased transport costs.】

item.title: 调查显示尼日利亚企业对奈拉的短期前景持悲观态度
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行的一项调查显示，尼日利亚企业预计从现在到 12 月奈拉会走弱，但明年会升值。【原文：Nigerian businesses expect the naira to weaken between now and December but it will appreciate next year, according to a survey by the central bank.】

item.title: 墨西哥经济放缓幅度略高于预期，原因是利率下行
item.description: 由于近两年两位数的借贷成本拖累了需求，墨西哥第二季度的经济增速与前三个月相比有所放缓。【原文：Mexico’s economy slowed in the second quarter compared to the three months prior, as nearly two years of double-digit borrowing costs weighed on demand.】

item.title: 德国即将达成拯救游轮制造商 Meyer Werft 的协议
item.description: 德国政府正在为陷入财务困境的造船厂 Meyer Werft GmbH 寻求潜在的救命稻草，这家私营企业几天前刚刚赢得了为迪斯尼游轮公司船队供应船只的后续合同。【原文：The German government is working on a potential lifeline for financially stricken shipbuilder Meyer Werft GmbH, the privately-held company that just days ago won a follow-on contract to supply vessels for Disney Cruise Line’s fleet.】

item.title: 宝马首次在欧洲电动汽车销量中超过特斯拉
item.description: 宝马汽车公司上个月在欧盟的电动汽车销量首次超过了特斯拉公司，因为这家德国汽车制造商在电池驱动汽车市场疲软的情况下设法增加了出货量。【原文：BMW AG outsold Tesla Inc. on electric vehicles in the European Union for the first time last month as the German carmaker managed to increase shipments in an otherwise weakening market for battery-powered cars.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员誓言对九月会议保持开放心态
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）上一次政策决定的说明显示，该行官员认为 9 月份是审查其利率立场的适当时机，不过他们承诺，鉴于通胀前景面临的风险依然存在，他们将保持开放的态度。【原文：European Central Bank officials deemed September to be an appropriate point to review their interest-rate stance, though pledged to keep an open mind in light of lingering risks to the inflation outlook, an account of their last policy decision showed.】

item.title: 铁路罢工扰乱通勤秩序，多伦多和蒙特利尔工人陷入困境
item.description: 由于加拿大两家最大的铁路公司发生劳资纠纷，加拿大三个最大城市的数千名乘客正在寻找其他上班方式。【原文：Thousands of commuters in three of Canada’s biggest cities are scouring for alternate ways to work due to a labor dispute involving two of the country’s largest railways.】

item.title: 风电产业尚未走出阴霾
item.description:
最糟糕的时期可能已经过去，但该行业距离全面复苏仍有一段距离。【原文：

The worst may have passed, but the sector is still some way off from a full recovery.

】

item.title: 扎克伯格推销其人工智能愿景，Meta 股价一飞冲天
item.description: 想在人工智能领域大手笔投入并获得投资者青睐的科技巨头，应该借鉴 Meta Platforms 公司的做法。【原文：Technology giants that want to spend big on artificial intelligence and stay in the good graces of investors should take a page out of Meta Platforms Inc.’s playbook.】

item.title: 香奈儿收购瑞士尖端制表商 MB&F 少数股权
item.description: 香奈儿有限公司正在收购瑞士钟表品牌 MB&F 的少数股份，这项交易将为这家独立制表商提供资金保障，同时提升法国时尚品牌在高级钟表业的地位。【原文：Chanel Ltd. is buying a minority stake in Swiss watch brand MB&F in a deal that will give the independent watchmaker financial security while boosting the French fashion brand’s standing in the high horology industry.】

item.title: 从红海受胡塞武装袭击的油轮上撤出船员
item.description: 一艘在红海遭遇数次袭击的船只的船主和管理者说，在海军的支援下，船员已从船上撤离。【原文：The crew of a ship that suffered several attacks in the Red Sea has been evacuated from the vessel with naval support, its owner and manager said.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储会议纪要显示，9 月降息是板上钉钉的事，经济数据的发布方式也存在问题。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The Fed minutes suggest a rate cut in September is on the cards and there are questions on how economic data gets released. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 匈牙利考虑将移民送往布鲁塞尔以报复欧盟罚款
item.description: 匈牙利表示，除非它能解决与欧盟在庇护政策处罚问题上的争议，否则它可能会开始将出现在其边境的移民直接运往布鲁塞尔。【原文：Hungary suggested it might start transporting migrants who show up at its border straight to Brussels unless it can resolve a dispute with the European Union on penalties for its asylum policies.】

item.title: 铜价急剧下跌助推全球贸易流动逆转
item.description: 今年 5 月，当铜在纽约飙升至历史新高时，一艘船正在太平洋上将一种未加工的金属从智利运往最大的买家中国。【原文：When copper surged toward a record high in New York in May, a ship was in the Pacific Ocean carrying a raw form of the metal from Chile to top buyer China.】
